plot: Four stars from the series Luck spend a day at the track and become thoughtfully, and surprisingly, absorbed in the microcosm that is horse racing.
title: Luck: A Day at the Races
plot_es: Four stars from the series Luck spend a day at the track and become thoughtfully, and surprisingly, absorbed in the microcosm that is horse racing.
original_name: Luck: A Day at the Races
plot_en: Four stars from the series Luck spend a day at the track and become thoughtfully, and surprisingly, absorbed in the microcosm that is horse racing.
